overview: Seventeen year-old orphan Chan Ka-Po, afflicted with severe facial swellings, acutely mis-matched ears and with his left eye, is called "Elephant Man" by others. Twenty-five year-old Lee Kut-Chang has the mind of an adult, but only the body of an infant, earned him the nickname of "Glass Bones Man".
tagline: The resilience and compassion of the human spirit.
title: 天生你才
